generalLanguage.description: Choose the default interface language that should be applied when the helper starts.

CFG_LH_LANG.label: Preferred language
CFG_LH_LANG.help: Set to 'auto' to match the current system locale automatically.

generalLoggingCore.description: Control the verbosity of the helper and where log messages should be written.

CFG_LH_LOG_LEVEL.label: Log level
CFG_LH_LOG_LEVEL.help: Select how much information should be emitted during runs.

CFG_LH_LOG_TO_CONSOLE.label: Send logs to console
CFG_LH_LOG_TO_CONSOLE.help: Disable when you only want logs written to the log file.

CFG_LH_LOG_TO_FILE.label: Write logs to file
CFG_LH_LOG_TO_FILE.help: Disable to prevent creation of log files in the log directory.

generalLoggingDetail.description: Fine tune metadata that is included with every log entry.

CFG_LH_LOG_SHOW_FILE_ERROR.label: Include script name on error level

CFG_LH_LOG_SHOW_FILE_WARN.label: Include script name on warn level

CFG_LH_LOG_SHOW_FILE_INFO.label: Include script name on info level

CFG_LH_LOG_SHOW_FILE_DEBUG.label: Include script name on debug level

generalGui.description: Adjust host and port of the Little Linux Helper web interface.

CFG_LH_GUI_HOST.label: Host binding
CFG_LH_GUI_HOST.help: Use 'localhost' to restrict access or '0.0.0.0' to serve other devices.

generalGuiAuth.description: Manage login requirements for the GUI when running on shared machines.

LLH_GUI_PASS_HASH.label: Password hash
LLH_GUI_PASS_HASH.help: Use the bundled --hash-password helper to generate bcrypt hashes.

LLH_GUI_PASS_PLAIN.label: Plaintext password (development only)
LLH_GUI_PASS_PLAIN.help: Only use in development environments, hashes are preferred.

LLH_GUI_COOKIE_SECURE.label: Mark cookie as secure
LLH_GUI_COOKIE_SECURE.help: Disable only when serving plain HTTP on localhost.

LLH_GUI_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.label: Allowed origins
LLH_GUI_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.help: Comma separated list of origins that may access the API (e.g. http://localhost:3001).

generalRelease.description: Optional release tag that is embedded into generated metadata to aid troubleshooting.

backupStorage.description: Set the directories that hold backups and staging snapshots.

CFG_LH_BACKUP_DIR.label: Backup directory
CFG_LH_BACKUP_DIR.help: Relative to the backup root and usually starts with '/'.

backupExcludes.description: Set additional TAR excludes that should never be archived.

CFG_LH_TAR_EXCLUDES.label: Exclude patterns
CFG_LH_TAR_EXCLUDES.help: Comma separated paths or glob patterns skipped during TAR backups.

backupRetention.description: Control how many backups are kept and where log files are stored.

backupSnapshots.description: Configure how source snapshots should be preserved during backup runs.

backupSubvolumes.description: Choose which subvolumes participate in backup runs.

dockerDiscovery.description: Define where to look for compose projects and which folders to skip.

CFG_LH_DOCKER_EXCLUDE_DIRS.label: Exclude directories
CFG_LH_DOCKER_EXCLUDE_DIRS.help: Comma separated list of directories relative to the scan root that should be skipped.

dockerScope.description: Control how the Docker security checks run.

CFG_LH_DOCKER_CHECK_RUNNING.label: Require running containers
CFG_LH_DOCKER_CHECK_RUNNING.help: If disabled, offline services are still inspected.

dockerWarnings.description: Mute noisy warnings or mark specific findings as acceptable.

CFG_LH_DOCKER_SKIP_WARNINGS.label: Warnings to skip
CFG_LH_DOCKER_SKIP_WARNINGS.help: Comma separated list of warning identifiers to hide.

CFG_LH_DOCKER_ACCEPTED_WARNINGS.label: Accepted warnings
CFG_LH_DOCKER_ACCEPTED_WARNINGS.help: Comma separated identifiers treated as acknowledged.

dockerPatterns.description: Modify the weak password detection regex used during container reviews.

COMMON_WEAK_PASSWORD_REGEX.label: Weak password regex
COMMON_WEAK_PASSWORD_REGEX.help: Advanced: adjust with care, the bundled pattern catches frequently exposed passwords.
